metadata.title: CVE-2021-20317 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernel. A corrupted timer tree caused thetask wakeup to be missing in the timerqueue_add function inlib/timerqueue.c. This flaw allows a local attacker with special userprivileges to cause a denial of service, slowing and eventually stoppingthe system while running OSP.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
